message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10.  This is a fair deal, considering inflation!
I'll give you a fair share, but not as generous as you were. It's time to negotiate!
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal, and we can both walk away with something decent.  Time is money, so let's not waste any more time.
I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving up yet. I want a better deal.
